alert.note: Alert for Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 7:51PM EDT until July 30 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following county, Sumter. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 748 PM EDT, Trained weather spotters heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms with 1 inch of rain in the past 30 minutes. An additional 1 to 2 inches of rain is possible. Minor flooding is expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sumter, South Sumter, Mulberry, Millwood, East Sumter and Cane Savannah. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown.
